name: deft
creator: Deft JS
summary: Extensions for Large-Scale Sencha Touch and Ext JS 5 Applications
detailedDescription: Deft JS extends Sencha Touch and Ext JS to add an Inversion of Control (IoC) container, for dependency injection and dynamic application assembly; and a Promises/A+ compliant implementation of Promises and Deferreds, for simplified coordination, aggregation and transformation of asynchronous operations and their resulting values.
